alert.note: Alert for Maries; Miller; Phelps; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 9:27AM CDT until July 18 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maries County in central Missouri... Miller County in central Missouri... Northern Pulaski County in central Missouri... Northern Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 927 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vienna, or 22 miles northwest of Rolla, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rolla, Lake of The Ozarks State Park, St. James, Dixon, Belle, Crocker, Iberia, Doolittle, Vienna, Newburg, Saint Elizabeth, St. Elizabeth, Tuscumbia, Brumley, Brinktown, Ulman, Vichy, Northwye, Marys Home and Jerome. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 172 and 179, and between mile markers 184 and 200. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
